comment.text: This translation key is used to display a label for a button or dialog that refers to default settings. It appears in various UI components such as buttons and save/cancel dialogs, prompting users to reset to default settings when they have unsaved changes. The exact placement may vary across different files.

usage.context:
<SaveCancelButtons
 onSaveClick={onSubmit}
 onCancelClick={onReset}
 saveButtonLabel={t("Common:SaveButton")}
 cancelButtonLabel={t("Settings:DefaultSettings")}
 reminderText={t("Settings:YouHaveUnsavedChanges")}
 saveButtonDisabled={saveButtonDisabled}
 disableRestoreToDefault={
 isDefaultSettings || isSaveLoading || isResetLoading
 }

<SaveCancelButtons
 className="save-cancel-buttons"
 onSaveClick={onSaveClick}
 onCancelClick={openResetModal}
 saveButtonLabel={t("Common:SaveButton")}
 cancelButtonLabel={t("Settings:DefaultSettings")}
 displaySettings
 hasScroll
 hideBorder
 saveButtonDisabled={saveDisabled}
 disableRestoreToDefault={resetDisabled}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'defolt' is a misspelling of 'default'.

While 'parametrler' is a valid word, 'parametrlar' is the more common and appropriate pluralization in Azerbaijani for 'parameters'. 'Settings:DefaultSettings' implies 'parameters' rather than a more general word.

The translation "По умолчанию" while literally meaning "by default," doesn't fully capture the meaning of "Default settings." It lacks the 'settings' portion. A more accurate translation would incorporate that concept.
The word 'පෙරනිමි' is a somewhat uncommon or archaic form. A more common and clearer translation for 'Default' would be 'පොහොසතාහակի' or 'පෙරහුන්'.
While 'පෙරනිමි' can loosely mean 'default', it's not the most natural or accurate translation in this context. It sounds overly formal and potentially confusing for the average user.

The Serbian (Cyrillic) translation "Подразумевана подешавања" while understandable, isn't the most natural or direct translation of 'Default settings'.  'Подразумевана' implies 'assumed' or 'implied' rather than 'default'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate and common translation would be 'Примерна подешавања' (Primerna podešavanja) or 'Злазная подешавања' (Zlazna podešavanja).
